item.title: How to learn ML
item.description: Learning path for AI/ML :sparkles: Programming Knowledge Programming knowledge is a must obviously. Learn Python :snake: Python basics: variables, conditions, loops..etc..etc..etc But most importantly installing packages, importing, using. Writing methods and using decorators. Object-oriented Python: class, inheritance. :bulb: The book automate the boring stuff is a good resource. :crystal_ball: Articles and Youtube videos by Sentdex is awesome! Install and setup stuffs :construction: Things you need and need not.
